forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. Thunder possible. High near 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 59F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 13C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 56F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High around 65F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low near 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 62F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 71F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
